Standing Committee of the National People's Congress
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4 Chang2 wu4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 全國人民代表大會常務委員會

sentences.english: Dong Zhaoli presented the report on the work of the standing committee of the 12th CPPCC Municipal Committee.
sentences.chinese: 董昭禮作市政協第十二屆委員會常務委員會工作報告。

sentences.english: Local people’s congresses at and above the county level establish standing committees.
sentences.chinese: 縣級以上的地方各級人民代表大會設立常務委員會。

sentences.english: At this very day, he was elected Chairman of the standing committee.
sentences.chinese: 就在這一天，他被選爲常務委員會主席。

sentences.english: Dong Zhaoli, chairman of the committee, delivered a report on the work of the standing committee of the 12th Hefei Municipal Committee.
sentences.chinese: 董昭禮作市政協第十二屆委員會常務委員會工作報告。

sentences.english: All YBAM Standing Committees are entitled to send two delegates to attend the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 各常務委員會皆可委派兩位代表出席會議。

sentences.english: Local people's congresses at and above the county level establish standing committees.
sentences.chinese: 縣級以上的地方各級人民代表大會設立常務委員會。
